title: Mrs Thirsty. PLS
body: I know this girl who just thirsts for me. But I am not a lesbo and I don't swing that way. She wants to call at every hour of the day and I like that. She wants to play league of lol with me but I refuse cos bad. she gets jelly when I talk to other girls and that's really cute. She is an amazing person but I'm just not ready to fully commit to the lesbo life. What to do? :\ help pls.

replies.body: Omg, since when was boards a forum about sex life. Rito pls.
It isn't and my thread has nothing to do with my sex life TYVM. It's about my social life and my public image of being a raging lesbian.

> [{quoted}](name=mrs styles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0qxTsEJh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-02T06:34:30.340+0000)
>
> Do you like her though?

Shes not a lesbian and she doesnt swing that way* pretty sure she meant she doesnt like her that way .

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0qxTsEJh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-02T06:49:44.262+0000)
>
> Shes not a lesbian and she doesnt swing that way* pretty sure she meant she doesnt like her that way .

no it doesn't. it just means she's not ready to come out of the closet. smh

>
> no it doesn't. it just means she's not reading to come out of the closet. smh

*PRETTY SURE* You dont officially know what she meant ? so dont go pointing people out even tho i didnt give a definite answer. *Facepalm*
goldentomato knows me well. So PRETTY SURE you should listen to him. He is basically my boyfriend.

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0qxTsEJh,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-02T06:54:10.215+0000)
>
> *PRETTY SURE* You dont officially know what she meant ? so dont go pointing people out even tho i didnt give a definite answer. *Facepalm*

I'm pretty sure I do. don't question me and my knowledge of people I'm extremely close with.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0qxTsEJh,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-06-02T07:12:19.285+0000)

Without proof  i do question you (DID YOU REALLY NOT THINK OF THAT?), maybe saying you are close instead of denying in the first place.
she is a sweet young girl :)

but u a hoe 

and you ain't loyal
